name: Baby Goat Billy (Studio90)
description:
EARLY ACCESS on STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1461960/Baby_Goat_Billy/


Game Summary:

A mix of deckbuilding and lite oldschool JRPGs in the style of Pokemon. Explore the world of ancient goat mythology while fighting the evil goat tribe that has kidnapped your baby brother.

Features:

  • Deckbuilding
  • Unique Totem mechanics
  • Turn-based combats
  • Talents that give bonuses and unlock more powerful cards
  • Roguelite dungeon runs
  • Story and dialogs
  • Dungeon obstacles
  • 3D Exploration

Game Discord: https://discord.gg/fsxKsMt8dw
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RPGumbata
